Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO REAL PROPERTY TAXATION

Title: Provides an exemption for certain fiber optic cable assessments in Erie county
Summary: Provides an exemption for certain fiber optic cable assessments in Erie county.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to providing an exemption against certain fiber optic cable assessments for municipal fiber optic broadband companies in Erie county
